tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE boxer_rankings (
    boxer_id INTEGER,
    boxer_name VARCHAR(50),
    boxing_category VARCHAR(50),
    wins INTEGER,
    losses INTEGER,
    draws INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE boxers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    loser_id INT,
    match_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    match_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
 match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 date DATE,
 venue VARCHAR(255),
 winner_id INT,
 loser_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE boxer (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), weight_class VARCHAR(50), wins INT, losses INT, draws INT);
CREATE TABLE match (match_id INT PRIMARY KEY, boxer_id INT, opponent_id INT, result VARCHAR(10), date DATE);
CREATE TABLE ranking (ranking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, boxer_id INT, weight_class VARCHAR(50), points INT);
CREATE TABLE weight_class (weight_class_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE opponent (opponent_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), wins INT, losses INT);
